name: Pazuzu
summary: This single mission takes you to a demonic series of underhalls and temples to the evil devil Pazuzu. The entire complex is guarded by some of your most feverish nightmares... Stay alert and work your way thru this unearthly place in search of the three ancient skulls of mystic held within the complex..... retrieve them and escape... hopefully with all of your limbs still attached!
